Package think.rpgitems.power.impl

Class PowerAOECommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • think.rpgitems.power.impl.BasePower
      • think.rpgitems.power.impl.PowerCommand
        • think.rpgitems.power.impl.PowerAOECommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Power, PowerHurt, PowerLeftClick, PowerPlain, PowerRightClick, PowerSneak, PowerSprint
    public class PowerAOECommand
extends PowerCommand
    Power aoecommand.

    The item will run PowerCommand.command for every entity in range(min blocks ~ max blocks in view angle) on isRightgiving the PowerCommand.permission just for the use of the command.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • selfapplication

        @Property
public boolean selfapplication
        Whether the command will be apply to the user

      • type

        @Property
public String type
        Type of targets. Can be `entity` `player` `mobs` now entity: apply the command to every LivingEntity in range player: apply the command to every Player in range mobs: apply the command to every LivingEntity except Playerin range

      • r

        @Property(order=6)
public int r
        Maximum radius

      • rm

        @Property(order=5)
public int rm
        Minimum radius

      • facing

        @Property(order=7,
          required=true)
public double facing
        Maximum view angle

      • c

        @Property
public int c
        Maximum count

      • mustsee

        @Property
public boolean mustsee
        Whether only apply to the entities that player have line of sight
